mainText:
I'm from Bogota Colombia, a South American city, and today I feel so bad for
this news. To my thinking he was an spectacular human being, who was able
to make to feel people connected with the technology, like me. You don't
know how my life changed since I had my iPod, it is my new land. I only wish
that Steve Jobs' family could overcome this event. And remember: now he is
in our memories, he is living in our minds and its never change.
author: Marcela
